Xiao 3D network¶

sota_implementations.xiao_2018.unet_3d_xiao.U_Net_3D_Xiao(image_shape, lr=0.0001, n_classes=2)[source]¶

Create 3D U-Net.

Parameters

  • image_shape (array of 3 int) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • activation (str, optional) – Keras available activation type.

  • lr (float, optional) – Learning rate value.

  • n_classes (int, optional) – Number of classes.

Returns

model – Xiao 3D U-Net type proposed network model.

Return type

Keras model

Here is a picture of the network extracted from the original paper:

sota_implementations.xiao_2018.unet_3d_xiao.residual_block(inp_layer, channels)[source]¶

Residual block definition.

Parameters

  • inp_layer (Keras layer) – Input layer.

  • channels (int) – Number of feature maps to use in Conv layers.

Returns

out – Last layer of the block.

Return type

Keras layer
